definitions.definition: the quality of not talking about or not trying to make people notice your abilities and achievements:
examples: She does a lot of work for charities, but her modesty forbids her from talking about it.

definitions.definition: said when you want to say something good about yourself, but do not want to seem to think you are too important:
examples: In all modesty, we'd probably have lost the game if I hadn't been playing.
